name: Get Manic
description: Get Manic offer bespoke Website Design, SEO services, Paid Search Campaign Management, Web Copy Writing, Article Writing, Social Marketing throughout Brighton and the UK. With clients throughout the UK benefiting from quality SEO services from Get Manic, we strive for success by gaining higher search rankings for businesses, developing your online brand, monitoring behavior flow and tracking analytics results to understand your business and the impact it has online.
